review: Arrived early. Very well packaged. Easy to install. Had to temporarily remove power to facilitate its software update after I signed on.I find the remote a little awkward to use, maybe because I'm used to my Roku remote. Surprisingly, it displays at 1080p on my 720p TV. I hope that doesn't cause a problem.Beyond that, the Fire TV Stick works fine, and is very responsive. But my experience using it is limited to watching one older movie "Lifeboat,"  since I just received my unit.
author: Marty O'Boyle

review: An ok product. Not very clear picture with Wi-fi and can be slow at times.
author: Robert M Compton

review: Love the fire stick.  We also have the roku. This out beats the roku much quicker
author: Kel

review: Works great! Easy setup,and very happy I got it at introductory price.Would buy again at regular price.
author: F. Kerry

review: The stick is good with some streaming and poor with others.  The mlb.tv app will hardly stream on it at all,  netflix is just ok. Always back to buffering. I've got a apple tv that's much further from the wifi that runs all the same programs seamlessly.  It's too bad, I like prime tv but that's really the only thing the stick does well.
author: Evan Grenier

review: No good!I'm a Prime member and Prime Instant Video won't work outside U.S.
author: Andrew Young "Aao"

review: It does not stay connected to the internet, I have a Roku and it works so much better.  I moved this to the same room as my wireless router and it still does not work correctly.
author: Lori DeShong

review: Perfect compliment to our Fire TV.  The stick is used in our playroom and as long as you have fast internet and a good WiFi signal, you are good to go.  We intend to travel with the stick.
